ygData.subject: Re: Rion + Diana
ygData.msgSnippet: Rion laughed a little as he glided slightly higher. He turned back to face Diana, leaning a bit to the side as he did so: Well, the Delta was a ship. It was

From: "FIRE FOX" <firefox_y2k@...>

Rion laughed a little as he glided slightly higher. He turned back to face 
Diana, leaning a bit to the side as he did so:

"Well, the Delta was a ship. It was made of metal. Maybe if you can smell 
more metal, we can find more ships."

Rion pulled a little higher, just out of the reach of Diana's claws. <Too 
bad she can't fly.> Rion thought sadly as he watched his friend flap her 
wings in vain. It was kinda funny though.

A sudden gust of wind blinded him momentarily and knowcked him back to the 
ground. OKay, so maybe he couldn't fly all that well yet. But he'd learn. 
Rion got to his feet and ran to catch up to Diana. He started walking beside 
her, his wings folded tightly against his back:

"Can you get any other 'bot signatures on your scanner? Mine's broken."
